feed.title: Port au Choix - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 08:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this morning then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain early this afternoon and then changing to rain showers or drizzle late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening then southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
